meanings.sent1: The fossiliferous rocks held ancient remains.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed many fossiliferous artifacts.
meanings.sent3: The fossiliferous stones whispered tales of the past.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a fossiliferous treasure trove of memories.
meanings.sent5: The fossiliferous layers revealed secrets of bygone eras.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to or characteristic of fossils.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the fossiliferous characteristics of the bone.
meanings.sent2: The fossiliferous nature of the soil indicated a prehistoric environment.
meanings.sent3: The fossiliferous scent of the museum brought back memories.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a fossiliferous reminder of ancient beauty.
meanings.sent5: The fossiliferous appearance of the rock amazed the geologists.
